data.meanings: a tongue/speech/language, to seize one by the tongue, bite one in words, make a thing sharp pointed, eloquent speech.
data.sentence: The word وَلِسَانًا comes from the root ل س ن and is associated with the meanings: a tongue/speech/language, to seize one by the tongue, bite one in words, make a thing sharp pointed, eloquent speech.

data.meanings: to strike on the lips, lip.
data.sentence: The word وَشَفَتَيْنِ comes from the root ش ف ه and is associated with the meanings: to strike on the lips, lip.
